title: Missing icon.
body: I just realised that i never got the Doomed Minion icon from the doomboots event a while back. I did the minion minigame twice because i wasen't sure if it had worked. Each time i got 500 minions and tried to redeem the icon it wanted me to sign in again so i just assumed it worked. Is there a way to still get the icon? :(

replies.body: Will do! Thank you for the fast response.

The Teemoing icons should be finished distributing by now.  If you haven't received your icon yet, reach out ot us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to look into case individually!
